scripts.build: npm run buildjs ; npm run buildcss
scripts.buildcss: rm -f dist/*.css && cat assets/fonts/icomoon-toolbar/style.css app/css/reset.css app/css/styles.css app/css/toolbar.css > dist/comicbook.css && cssmin dist/comicbook.css > dist/comicbook.min.css
scripts.buildjs: rm -f dist/*.js && browserify --transform babelify --transform strictify --transform browserify-handlebars app/index.js --debug | exorcist dist/comicbook.js.map > dist/comicbook.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle --source-map dist/comicbook.min.js.map --source-map-root ./ --output dist/comicbook.min.js -- dist/comicbook.js
scripts.test: mochify -R spec --transform babelify --transform strictify --transform browserify-handlebars test/**/*.test.js
